1.title: Jalsa
1.info: A fun-filled action entertainer starring Pawan Kalyan, blending comedy and drama.

2.title: Sahoo
2.info: A high-octane action thriller featuring Prabhas and Shraddha Kapoor, packed with stunts and suspense.

3.title: Srimanthudu
3.info: Mahesh Babu stars in this family drama about social responsibility and rural development.

4.title: Pokiri
4.info: A blockbuster action film with Mahesh Babu, known for its gripping story and memorable dialogues.

5.title: Pushpa
5.info: Allu Arjun shines in this rugged action drama set in the red sanders smuggling world.

6.title: Tagore
6.info: Chiranjeevi leads this social action film about fighting corruption and injustice.

7.title: Geetha Govindam
7.info: A romantic comedy starring Vijay Deverakonda and Rashmika Mandanna, loved for its humor and chemistry.

8.title: rrr
8.info: A supernatural thriller that became a trendsetter in Indian horror cinema.

9.title: Sultan
9.info: Salman Khan stars as a wrestler in this inspiring sports drama about redemption and perseverance.

10.title: Jawaan
10.info: Shah Rukh Khan headlines this action-packed film with a patriotic theme and powerful performances.

11.title: Formula 1
11.info: A thrilling motorsport documentary capturing the excitement and drama of Formula 1 racing.

12.title: Haunted
12.info: A chilling horror film set in a mysterious mansion, known for its suspenseful plot and scares.
